name: Trickstar Light Arena
desc: If you Link Summon a "Trickstar" monster: You can target 1 "Trickstar" monster in your GY, that was used as material for that Link Summon; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it has its effects negated. You can only use this effect of "Trickstar Light Arena" once per turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 Set card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; while this card is in the Field Zone, that Set card cannot be activated until the End Phase, and your opponent must activate it during the End Phase or else return it to the hand.
